page.title: 19Chelmsford Council (1)
page.content: On{July 3rd 1985}a group of{4 child- {ren}from Lawford Mead accommpanied by their teacher and a parent attended a meeting of the{Public Health {Committee.}Prior to the meeting we were welcomed by the Mayor and briefed on the agenda by him and the Chief Public Health Officer. The{main items}on the{agenda}were {(a) the retail market (b) the Social {Services 5 year plan (c) change of {Hospital Casualty Department (d) {litter (e) a "dog loo" (f) byelaws for {straw and stubble burning. {Retail Market.}The differences bet- ween the Retail Market Traders and the Secondhand Market traders were discussed at length together with the ways in which the rents should be collected.
